pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic, first-person view from a drone flying low and fast over a landscape. The camera skims across a vibrant green field, following two parallel dirt tracks that lead up a gentle slope. At the top of the hill is a dense forest under a clear blue sky with fluffy white clouds.
